history.content:
Hey everyone! If you're taking CS61A, CS61B, CS61C, or CS70 this summer or fall you should checkout Edlyft, a startup on campus supporting students in their toughest CS courses. It’s a great way to get your questions answered quickly & stay on track in a smaller, supportive environment led by Cal student mentors who've already aced your class. They have limited spots on their waitlist. Learn more at https://edlyft.com/waitlist.

Mentors are also hosting intro sessions starting next week to give students a preview of the class & get ahead, while trying Edlyft. Edlyft helps students in CS classes by matching you to a mentor who's mastered the course for support and to others in the class. Sign up for an intro session here by Monday 6/14 to reserve your spot: http://bit.ly/edlyft-cs-intros This session is free & open, but spots are limited.

No worries if you're not taking a summer course-- Edlyft also has cohorts to prep for internship recruiting that you can checkout here: https://edlyft.com/career-support
history.subject: Need tutoring/mentoring help in CS courses?
